Hours & Location
416 W. 8th St,
Los Angeles, CA 90014
(213) 612-0021
Hours of Operation
Every Day: 12:00pm - 12:00am
Kitchen Hours
Sunday-Thursday: 12:00pm - 7:00pm
Friday & Saturday: 12:00am - 8:00pm
Happy Hour
Monday-Sunday: 3:00pm - 6:00pm
Valet
We offer 24/7 valet service at the front of the hotel. If you are visiting Broken Shaker, it is $10 + tax with validation from your server or bartender
About
An oasis in the heart of Downtown LA, Broken Shaker, located on our rooftop pool deck, offers an eclectic menu of handcrafted cocktails and small bites. A James Beard Award finalist and winner of Tales of the Cocktail’s Best American Hotel Bar award, operated by
Authentic Hospitality
, Broken Shaker serves up delicious cocktails, infused with homemade elixirs and exotic ingredients, bringing the flavors of the beach to the center of the city.
Get Directions

Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides
Hours & Location
Calle de San Bernardo 2,
Madrid 28013
+34 910 47 98 00
Winter operating hours
Friday to Sunday: 1pm – 6pm
About
Experience an elevated cocktail adventure at Broken Shaker Madrid, a hidden gem perched atop Generator Madrid. With awe-inspiring views of the Spanish capital, Broken Shaker Madrid offers an enchanting escape where handcrafted cocktails and tantalizing bites steal the show.
Broken Shaker Madrid seamlessly joins the ranks of our James Beard Award finalist and Tales of the Cocktail's Best American Hotel Bar-winning venues. Get ready to be captivated by the artistry and expertise of our talented bartenders as they craft unforgettable libations. Combining Madrid's vibrant spirit with Broken Shaker's legendary hospitality, our rooftop oasis guarantees an unforgettable experience that exceeds all expectations.
Vive una aventura de cócteles en Broken Shaker Madrid, una joya escondida en lo alto de Generator Madrid. Con impresionantes vistas de la capital española, Broken Shaker Madrid ofrece una escapada encantadora en la que cócteles artesanales y tentadores bocados son protagonistas.
Broken Shaker Madrid se une sin problemas a las filas de nuestros locales finalistas de los premios James Beard y Tales of the Cocktail's Best American Hotel Bar. Prepárate para dejarte cautivar por el arte y la maestría de nuestros talentosos barmans mientras elaboran inolvidables copas. Combinando el vibrante espíritu de Madrid con la legendaria hospitalidad de Broken Shaker, nuestro oasis en la azotea garantiza una experiencia inolvidable que supera todas las expectativas.
Get Directions
Happenings
Check out our current events.
Learn more
Private Events
Have your next event with us!
Book Now

Check out our current offerings.

Hours & Location
19 East Ohio St.,
Chicago, IL 60611
(312) 940-3699
Hours of Operation
Monday - Thursday: 4pm - 1am
Friday & Saturday: 4pm - 2am
Sunday: 6pm - 12am
Broken Shaker Café: open daily at 7am
About
Operated by
Authentic Hospitality
, expect the perfect blend of ingredients and international flavors from Tales of the Cocktail’s “Best Hotel Bar” award-winning duo as you explore our diverse, street-food inspired menu. Revel in the ingenious cocktails composed of elixirs, syrups, and infusions made from garden herbs and spices, fresh-pressed produce, and exotic ingredients from around the world. Our skilled mixologists are shaking up the perfect blend of ingredients and international flavors to complete your getaway to River North!
Make a Reservation
Order Online
Get Directions

Hours & Location
2727 Indian Creek Dr.,
Miami Beach, FL 33140
(786) 476-7011
Hours of Operation
Sunday to Thursday: 5pm – 12am
Friday & Saturday: 5pm – 1am
Kitchen Hours
Full menu 5pm - 11:45pm daily
Happy Hour Daily 5pm - 7pm - order at the bar, sip at the pool
La Piscina Happy Hour
Join us poolside for discounted bites and drinks
Daily 5pm - 7pm
About
A favorite hangout amongst visitors and locals alike, Broken Shaker takes shape in an elegant, brick lined courtyard, nestled amongst the tropical fauna at Freehand Hotel. Operated by
Authentic Hospitality
, the bar offers tasteful and relaxed of cocktails and pan Caribbean bites. In the evenings and during the day Friday, Saturday and Sunday, service expands poolside where guests can join us in groups around a sparkling disco ball and homegrown garden.
We also have a gorgeous, hidden garden adjacent to the bar. It is ideal to be used separately as an intimate event space or as part of a larger scale gathering. More information can be found on our
private events page
Make a Reservation
Get Directions

Planning an Event?
We would love to host you! We have four full service bars, two located indoors and two located outdoors. The outdoor bars have a retractable roof. Both interior bars come with a fully equipped DJ booth and are available to be booked for events year round. We can accommodate groups of 15  - 400. Please inquire with our event sales team for more information:
events.nyc@thefreehand.com

Looking to Plan an Event?
WE'D LOVE TO HOST YOU!
Recently revamped by
Authentic Hospitality,
industry staple Broken Shaker offers three distinct event areas, each with their own bar: the Patio, the Pool and the Secret Garden. They can be booked individually for groups of up to 100 or combined for larger groups of up to 500.
A private entrance is also available. Additionally, Broken Shaker is located adjacent to Authentic Hospitality's newest bar,
Ray's Hometown Bar
. Combined, the two bars can accommodate up to 700 guests. You can also use smaller parts of both bars to create your own unique event for a smaller guest count.
Need hotel rooms to go with your event? Broken Shaker is within Freehand Hotel and is happy to accommodate room blocks. Inquire with our sales team below for more information.
(305) 531-2727
events.miami@thefreehand.com
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat

Hours & Location
23 Lexington Avenue,
New York, NY 10010
(212) 475-1920
Hours of Operation
Tuesday - Wednesday 4pm - 12am
Thursday - Saturday 4pm - 1am
Sunday - Monday Closed
21+ After 6pm
Happy Hour
4- 6pm daily
About
A rooftop cocktail bar with sweeping views of Manhattan, Broken Shaker offers an eclectic menu of handcrafted cocktails and fresh bites. Operated by
Authentic Hospitality
, Broken Shaker is a James Beard Award finalist and winner of Tales of the Cocktail’s Best American Hotel Bar.
We are located on the 18th floor of Freehand Hotel. During the colder months, the entrance is through the hotel lobby. During the warmer months, the entrance moves to 24th Street.
Interested in hosting an event with us? Email us at
teams@authentic.nyc
and our event team would be glad to assist.
Make a Reservation
Get Directions

hero gallery paused, press to play images slides
Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides
WELCOME TO BROKEN SHAKER
Started as a pop up in Miami in 2012 and established as an industry favorite by 2014, Broken Shaker is a cocktail bar inspired by the beauty of the Caribbean. In partnership with operators
Authentic Hospitality
, the bar is now in five cities:
Miami
,
New York
,
Los Angeles
,
Chicago
and
Madrid
. Visit us for an inspired drink and bite at any of them.
As James Beard Award semi-finalists & Tale’s of the Cocktail’s Best American Hotel Bar winners, we take our liquor seriously.
New York
A year round rooftop cocktail bar with sweeping views of Manhattan, Broken Shaker NYC is located 18 floors above the Gramercy and Flatiron neighborhoods in Freehand Hotel.
View Happenings
Los Angeles
An oasis in the heart of Downtown LA, Broken Shaker is located on Freehand Hotel's rooftop pool deck and offers an eclectic menu of handcrafted cocktails and small bites.
View Happenings
Miami
The one that started it all, Broken Shaker Miami consists of a patio nestled poolside amongst the interior courtyard of Freehand Hotel.
View Happenings
Chicago
Expect the perfect blend of ingredients and international flavors from Tales of the Cocktail’s “Best Hotel Bar” award-winning duo and explore our diverse street-food inspired menu.
View Happenings
Madrid
Where Madrid’s skyline meets creative cocktails, Broken Shaker sits atop Generator Hotel, bringing bold flavours and rooftop vibes to the heart of the city.
View Happenings
Follow Us
@BrokenShaker
